title: [Elenesse Atelier, Hall]
description: Stretching from the foyer in the south to the alcove in the north, a long fuzzy runner of shaggy white roltalen muffles the movement of those within the hall.  Large windows capped in keyhole arches dominate the western walls with their leaded, stained-glass designs and each is surrounded by a plethora of frosted globes that keep the expanse illuminated.  Here and there, doors providing entry to various workspaces fill the space beyond the white stucco walls.
